languages.text: "Гвардейцы пребывают на Летусе годами, если не десятками лет. И постоянно прибывают все новые. Они плюют на устав, заводят кланы, семьи, потомство. Таковы пагубные последствия бесцельности их существования и доказательство отсутствия стойкости духа".

"Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."
languages.original_text: "Гвардейцы пребывают на Летусе годами, если не десятками лет. И постоянно прибывают все новые. Они плюют на устав, заводят кланы, семьи, потомство. Таковы пагубные последствия бесцельности их существования и доказательство отсутствия стойкости духа".

traits.locale_text: "Guardsmen stay on Leethus for years, if not decades. And new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, start clans, families, offspring. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

"Guardsmen stay on Leethus for years, if not decades. And new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, start clans, families, offspring. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

"Guardsmen stay on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, families, offspring. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

"Guardsmen stay on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, families, offspring. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

"Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

"Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

languages.text: «Esos soldados llevan años en Leethus, si no décadas, y no dejan de llegar más. Ignoran toda regulación, forman clanes, se unen en familias y procrean. Esas son las terribles consecuencias de esta vida absurda junto con su falta de entereza».
languages.original_text: "Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

traits.locale_text: «Esos soldados llevan años en Leethus, si no décadas, y no dejan de llegar más. Ignoran toda regulación, forman clanes, se unen en familias y procrean. Esas son las terribles consecuencias de esta vida absurda junto con su falta de entereza».

languages.text: “那些帝国卫队士兵已经在利瑟斯很久很久了，可能长达几十年之久，而且新的士兵一直在不断送达。他们罔顾律法，自立氏族，组建家庭，繁衍后代。目前的状况，正是他们肆意妄为的后果，也是他们缺乏韧性的证明。”
languages.original_text: "Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

traits.locale_text: “那些帝国卫队士兵已经在利瑟斯很久很久了，可能长达几十年之久，而且新的士兵一直在不断送达。他们罔顾律法，自立氏族，组建家庭，繁衍后代。目前的状况，正是他们肆意妄为的后果，也是他们缺乏韧性的证明。”

languages.text: 「あのガーズマンたちは、数十年とはいかなくとも長い間リーザスにおり、ずっと新しい連中がやってきています。彼らは規制を無視し、徒党を組み、家族を作り、子孫を産みます。あれは、彼らの無目的な存在の悪しき結果であり、彼らの我慢強さの欠如の証明なのです」
languages.original_text: "Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

traits.locale_text: 「あのガーズマンたちは、数十年とはいかなくとも長い間リーザスにおり、ずっと新しい連中がやってきています。彼らは規制を無視し、徒党を組み、家族を作り、子孫を産みます。あれは、彼らの無目的な存在の悪しき結果であり、彼らの我慢強さの欠如の証明なのです」

languages.text: « Ces gardes sont cantonnés sur Leethus depuis des années, si ce n'est des décennies, et de nouvelles recrues débarquent en permanence. À la longue, ils ont fini par former des clans, fonder des familles et procréer au mépris du règlement. Telles sont les conséquences pernicieuses de leur faiblesse de caractère, mais aussi d'une existence totalement dénuée de sens. »
languages.original_text: "Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

traits.locale_text: « Ces gardes sont cantonnés sur Leethus depuis des années, si ce n'est des décennies, et de nouvelles recrues débarquent en permanence. À la longue, ils ont fini par former des clans, fonder des familles et procréer au mépris du règlement. Telles sont les conséquences pernicieuses de leur faiblesse de caractère, mais aussi d'une existence totalement dénuée de sens. »

languages.text: "Muhafızlar yıllardır, hatta belki de on yıllardır Leethus'ta bulunuyor ve sürekli olarak yenileri geliyor. Mevzuatı hiçe sayıyorlar, klan kuruyorlar, aile oluyorlar ve ürüyorlar. Bunlar, amaçsız varoluşlarının vahim sonuçları ve metanet eksikliklerinin kanıtıdır."
languages.original_text: "Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

traits.locale_text: "Muhafızlar yıllardır, hatta belki de on yıllardır Leethus'ta bulunuyor ve sürekli olarak yenileri geliyor. Mevzuatı hiçe sayıyorlar, klan kuruyorlar, aile oluyorlar ve ürüyorlar. Bunlar, amaçsız varoluşlarının vahim sonuçları ve metanet eksikliklerinin kanıtıdır."

languages.text: "Diese Gardisten waren seit Jahren, wenn nicht Jahrzehnten auf Leethus und ständig treffen neue ein. Sie ignorieren die Regeln, bilden Clans, gründen Familien und pflanzen sich fort. Das sind die verderblichen Folgen ihrer sinnlosen Existenz und Belege für ihre mangelnde Tapferkeit.
languages.original_text: "Those Guardsmen have been on Leethus for years, if not decades, and new ones keep arriving all the time. They disregard regulations, form clans, start families, and procreate. Such are the pernicious consequences of their aimless existence and the proof of their lack of fortitude."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Gardisten waren seit Jahren, wenn nicht Jahrzehnten auf Leethus und ständig treffen neue ein. Sie ignorieren die Regeln, bilden Clans, gründen Familien und pflanzen sich fort. Das sind die verderblichen Folgen ihrer sinnlosen Existenz und Belege für ihre mangelnde Tapferkeit.
